EmailTemplate.name: CCM Knowledge Rejection Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Article Publish:- Rejection Notice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Article Owner,
The following Knowledge Article has been rejected, please refer to the related section of the article to see the approval comments and make necessary corrections before re-submitting for approval: Article Title: {!Knowledge__kav.Title}
Login
Sincerely. Cummins Support
If you have trouble clicking on the button, please click here.
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
